alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Dougherty; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 3:26PM EDT until May 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... North central Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Doerun, or 11 miles north of Moultrie, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylvester, Doerun, Poulan, Schley, Bridgeboro, Minton, Gordy, Livingston, Anderson City, Ticknor, Tempy, Minnesota, Parkerville, Powelltown, Sigsbee, Pritchetts, Gammage, Crestwood, Isabella and New Elm. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
